# The `XCoreLowerThreadLocal.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file contains a pass that lowers thread local variables on the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/xcore">XCore</a>. <a href="#details">More...</a>
